thread:
Retro-Search improves reasoning efficiency by refining paths to avoid underthinking and overthinking. 🧠💡 #AIResearch #Efficiency
 Link: https://arxiv.org/abs/2504.04383

Researchers refine models through self-improvement and weak-to-strong revision, boosting performance and reducing inference time, reaching top-tier results on math benchmarks via shorter reasoning paths. 🔬🚀 #AIAdvances #MathBenchmark
Researchers are using MCTS-inspired search to improve trajectory refinement. 🧠🚀 #AIAdvancements #EfficientReasoning
